com.nutiteq.datasources.vector

Class SimplifierVectorDataSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nutiteq.vectordatasources.AbstractVectorDataSource<com.nutiteq.geometry.Geometry>
      • com.nutiteq.datasources.vector.SimplifierVectorDataSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.nutiteq.vectordatasources.VectorDataSource<com.nutiteq.geometry.Geometry>

    public class SimplifierVectorDataSource
extends com.nutiteq.vectordatasources.AbstractVectorDataSource<com.nutiteq.geometry.Geometry>
    Data source for simplifying original geometric data. For points, uses simple bucketing algorithm (points are associated with integer coordinates and only one point with unique coordinates is kept). For lines and polygons, Douglas-Peucker algorithm is used for ring simplification.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.nutiteq.vectordatasources.VectorDataSource

    • Constructor Detail

      • SimplifierVectorDataSource

        public SimplifierVectorDataSource(com.nutiteq.vectordatasources.VectorDataSource<com.nutiteq.geometry.Geometry> dataSource,
                          float tolerance)
        Default constructor
        Parameters:
        dataSource - original data source
        tolerance - error tolerance parameter for simplification. 0.1f can be used for rough simplification, 0.01f for finer simplification.
